opportunities.title: 26-1502 Supply and Delivery of Bulk Liquid Aluminum Sulphate
opportunities.description:
Aluminium sulphate is utilized as a coagulant in the water and wastewater treatment processes. Given the critical nature of these operations, the Supplier will work closely with The City to maintain clear communication, ensure consistency in order placement, and provide timely delivery of bulk aluminium sulphate.

The Supplier will be required to ensure a secured source of supply of aluminium sulphate at all times, including provision of an acceptable alternative to ensure there are no interrupt

opportunities.title: Parking Lot/Roadway/Parkade Cleaning and Line Painting Services for Various sites in Edmonton Zone
opportunities.organization: Health Shared Services Provincial Health Corporation
opportunities.description: This Request for Proposals (“RFP”) is an invitation by Health Shared Services Provincial Health Corporation (“HSS”) to prospective Proponents to submit proposals for the provision of Parking Lot/Roadway/Parkade Cleaning and Line Painting Services for Various Sites in Edmonton Zone.

opportunities.title: Liquid Waste Removal Services - William A Switzer Provincial Park
opportunities.description: Parks Operations Division strives to maintain a clean and safe environment of the provincial parks and provincial recreation areas under its jurisdiction. These contracts will ensure that the campground sites within the Provincial Parks and campgrounds are clean and safe for public use. Contract services are to be provided for a 3 year period, with the general range of service being provided between the periods of May 15 to October 31 each season, for the term of the agreement, beginning May 1,

opportunities.title: Portable Veterinary Ultrasound System and Support Services
opportunities.description: The University of Calgary (UCalgary) intends to purchase the GE LOGIQ e Vet R9 Console with transducers, probe, and the associated support services from Antech Diagnostics. The UCalgary Vet Medicine Laboratory Teaching Team requires the GE LOGIQ e Vet R9 ultrasound system to effectively support the diverse needs of faculty members across three different units. These requirements include various species, both field and hospital settings, and a wide range of anatomical areas of clinical interests.

opportunities.title: RFP 938901 Supply and Delivery of Swimming Pool Water Treatment Chemicals, Reagents and Supplies
opportunities.description: For the provision of all labour, materials and equipment required for the supply and delivery of water filtration and water treatment products to swimming pools and recreation owned and operated by the City of Edmonton on an if, as and when required basis.

opportunities.title: Quality Center Software as a Service (SaaS)
opportunities.description: The City of Calgary provides notice of its intent to contract directly with Micro Focus Software Solutions Canada Co. (Parent: Open Text Corporation), the manufacturer, to source the ALM Quality Center Enterprise Edition-SaaS and related solutions in Canada

opportunities.title: GNCH MDRD – TP1
opportunities.description:
Aman Builders Inc. on behalf of Alberta Infrastructure

Tender Package 1 includes Work enabling and decant works to support phased MDRD relocation within an active hospital. Scope includes selective demolition, abatement, minor structural and concrete modifications, penetrations, and installation of architectural finishes and hygienic wall systems where required. Work will be executed in controlled phases enhanced IPC protocols to maintain safe hospital operations and support staged relocation o

opportunities.title: Digital Trust for Places and Routines
opportunities.description: Digital Trust for Places and Routines (DTPR.io) is an open-source standard used globally to enhance smart city initiatives. It focuses on principles like transparency, privacy, and citizen engagement to boost public awareness and trust in emerging technologies. The City of Calgary’s implementation of DTPR supports their Smart City Team’s efforts in technology experimentation and pilot projects, aiming to build community confidence in the city’s technological advancements.

opportunities.title: Electrical Testing Systems
opportunities.description: The nanoFAB Centre at the University of Alberta requires an electrical testing system for high-performance, high-throughput measurements of radio-frequency and microwave devices with easy operation suitable for a core facility environment. The tool set shall provide high-performance measurement through both a Vector Network Analyzer (VNA) and an accompanying Digital Oscilloscope. The tools shall be capable of providing single- and multiport measurements of intermodal distortion (IMD), third-orde

opportunities.title: RFQ - Grassy Lake Leak Detection Services
opportunities.description:
The Municipal District of Taber (MD) is seeking an appropriate and qualified contractor to complete leak detection services on each of the MDs water distribution systems in the Hamlet of Grassy Lake, Alberta.

The successful proponent will be responsible for providing all equipment, labour and expertise necessary to perform acoustic leak detection survey throughout the Hamlet. The goal is to identify and locate any hidden leaks to reduce water leakage and prevent catastrophic pipe failures.

opportunities.title: Commercial Zero-Turn Mower
opportunities.description: Leduc County is seeking a new, commercial grade mower which is primarily used for areas inaccessible to larger mowing units, such as boulevards and in tight corners. The need for this type of mower within the fleet has increased in recent years due to the changing park environment.  Specifically, the increased development of boulevards and small areas within urban communities that require maintenance. opportunities.title: Janitorial Services for Transit Buildings, Buses and Bus Shelters
opportunities.description:
This Request for Proposals (the “RFP”) is an invitation by the City of St. Albert (the “City”) to prospective proponents to submit proposals for Janitorial Services at Transit Buildings, Buses, and Bus Shelters  as further described in Section A of the RFP Particulars (Appendix B) (the “Deliverables”).

opportunities.title: Acheson PRV-1 (Navstar) Replacement with Dual Pressure Reducing Valve
opportunities.description:

opportunities.title: Notice To Vendor Category 5 FIS
opportunities.solicitationNumber: EDM-CI-2024-025 Bundle 5 Family and Care Supports 2 years
opportunities.description:
The Service:
Service Category 5 - Child Intervention Early Childhood Development and Early Intervention:
These services provide community-based supports to families to strengthen protective factors and reduce the risk factors related to child maltreatment and abuse. Examples: 
a) Parent education and support
b) Early childhood development
c) Information and referral
d) Service coordination and navigation
e) Community development
f) Collaborative service delivery (formerly OBSD)

opportunities.title: One Ton Truck
opportunities.description: The City of Camrose is inviting prospective respondents to submit non-binding quotations for the supply and delivery of one (1) one ton extended cab truck with 8' box.

opportunities.title: NOTICE TO VENDORS Category 7 Community Group Care February 2026_1
opportunities.description:
These services provide children, youth and their families in Alberta with day-to-day care and interventions that are targeted towards family reunification, preservation and permanency. Examples: 
a) Campus-based therapeutic group care
b) Community based therapeutic group care
c) Community Based group care
d) Secure services (under Child Youth and Family Enhancement Act and Protection of Sexually Exploited Children Act)
e) Specialized out-of-home placements and supports

opportunities.title: SUPPLY AND DELIVERY OF 1 SPECIAL SERVICE VEHICLE (SSV)
opportunities.description:
Yellowhead County Protective Services is replacing current aging Special Service Vehicle (SSV). This Special Service Vehicle (SSV) will be utilized within the Community under the Protective Services program for Fire/Rescue Services. This vehicle will respond to a number of different incidents. The function of this (SSV) provides first due Emergency response to any scenes Fire/Rescue Services respond to.
